Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~blintgit do you wish to keep this open or, can it be closed? Thanks

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~blintgit I would also refer you to the #fabric-evm channel in RocketChat... there is a collaboration between Fabric and Burrow engineers to implement an EVM in Fabric. https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-6590

Action.author: blintgit
Action.body: Thank you for the reference and the reminder. I close it now :)
